Title: Relates to the provision of end stage renal disease services
Summary: Includes ambulatory surgery centers established exclusively to create and maintain vascular access necessary to dialyze patients with end stage renal disease as part of diagnostic or treatment centers to provide end stage renal disease services.
LawCode: Amd ยง2801-a, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to the provision of end stage renal disease services
